name: Explo Bot (DEMO)
description:
WARNING THE GAME MAY BE LOUD!

This is a game I made during a single week-end with the help of my friends. It's inspired by games such as Jump King. 

Help your robot friend get plugged in, the poor thing is low on battery.

How to play : 

- Throw bombs with left mouse, detonate with right mouse.
- If you dont have any bomb out, your may detonate yourself with right mouse.

Future of the project (may or may not happen):
- Different ways of moving
- Background
- More everything (sounds, tileset, etc...)

Credits :
Art, Animation, Coding - Victor Leblond (me) @Stoui#9774
Sound Effect, Level Design - Leo Tremblay @ExoticWaffle#8519
Music - Kelvin Chen @Grapefruit Bush#0533
